speaker: Doctor
text: Hi there! How have you been feeling since we switched to the long-acting methylphenidate?

speaker: Patient
text: Um, I think it's okay. I can do my school work better now.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's great to hear. Have you noticed any problems, like trouble sleeping or not feeling hungry?

speaker: Patient
text: Sometimes I don't want to eat lunch, but I eat dinner.

speaker: Doctor
text: Okay, that's something we can keep an eye on. Are you having any trouble with the medicine wearing off too early in the day?

speaker: Patient
text: No, I think it lasts until I get home from school.
